name: Rank OÜ
goal: The company has been active for ten years. The core activities are related to development of zero energy construction project, providing experts services for REA of EC (evaluation ENG panel of FP-7, Horizon 2020), teaching in fields of circular economy, environmental engineering.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Education and training, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives:
Participation in discussion group for environmental reporting OECD mission, fields: implementation of Waste Directive, Energy Efficiency Directive.
Member of the unofficial expert group "Circular economy financing"
